articles.title: Cryptocurrencies add nothing useful to society, says chip-maker Nvidia - The Guardian

articles.content:
The US chip-maker Nvidia has said cryptocurrencies do not bring anything useful for society despite the companys powerful processors selling in huge quantities to the sector.
